00020 /**
00021  * @file   md5-check-test.cpp
00022  * @brief  Program for doing regression tests on md5-check.
00023  */
00024 
00025 #include "util/RegressionTest.h"
00026 
00027 using namespace std;
00028 
00029 class MD5CheckTest
00030 {
00031 
00032 public:
00033   int numPassed, numFailed;
00034   string md5app;
00035   MD5CheckTest()
00036   {
00037     numPassed = 0;
00038     numFailed = 0;
00039     #ifdef _WIN32
00040     md5app = "./apt-md5-check.exe";
00041     #else
00042     md5app = "./apt-md5-check";
00043     #endif
00044   }
00045   void testWithAppParam();
00046   void testWithSaltParam();
00047   void testFailure();
00048   void testFileNotFound();
00049 
00050 
00051 
00052 };
00053 
00054 void MD5CheckTest::testWithAppParam()
00055 {
00056   string command = md5app + " -v 2 -a \"DMET Console\" -i data/translations_md5.rpt";
00057   vector<RegressionCheck *> checks;
00058   RegressionTest differencesTest ("testWithAppParam", command.c_str(), checks);
00059   Verbose::out (1, "\nDoing testWithAppParam()");
00060   if (differencesTest.run())
00061     ++numPassed;
00062   else
00063   {
00064     Verbose::out (1, "Error in MD5CheckTest::testWithAppParam(): " + differencesTest.getErrorMsg());
00065     ++numFailed;
00066   }
00067 }
00068 
00069 void MD5CheckTest::testWithSaltParam()
00070 {
00071   string command = md5app + " -v 2 -s salt -i data/translations_md5.rpt";
00072   vector<RegressionCheck *> checks;
00073   RegressionTest differencesTest ("testWithSaltParam", command.c_str(), checks);
00074   Verbose::out (1, "\nDoing testWithSaltParam()");
00075   if (differencesTest.run())
00076     ++numPassed;
00077   else
00078   {
00079     Verbose::out (1, "Error in MD5CheckTest::testWithSaltParam(): " + differencesTest.getErrorMsg());
00080     ++numFailed;
00081   }
00082 }
00083 
00084 void MD5CheckTest::testFailure()
00085 {
00086   string command = md5app + " -v 2 -i data/translations_md5.rpt";
00087   vector<RegressionCheck *> checks;
00088   RegressionTest differencesTest ("testFailure", command.c_str(), checks);
00089   Verbose::out (1, "\nDoing testFailure()");
00090   if (differencesTest.run() == false)
00091     ++numPassed;
00092   else
00093   {
00094     Verbose::out (1, "Error in MD5CheckTest::testFailure(): " + differencesTest.getErrorMsg());
00095     ++numFailed;
00096   }
00097 }
00098 
00099 void MD5CheckTest::testFileNotFound()
00100 {
00101   string command =  md5app + " -v 2 -i file_does_not_exist";
00102   vector<RegressionCheck *> checks;
00103   RegressionTest differencesTest ("testFileNotFound", command.c_str(), checks);
00104   Verbose::out (1, "\nDoing testFileNotFound()");
00105   if (differencesTest.run() == false)
00106     ++numPassed;
00107   else
00108   {
00109     Verbose::out (1, "Error in MD5CheckTest::testFileNotFound(): " + differencesTest.getErrorMsg());
00110     ++numFailed;
00111   }
00112 }
00113 
00114 int main (int argc, char* argv[])
00115 {
00116   try {
00117     MD5CheckTest test;
00118     Verbose::setLevel(2);
00119     test.testWithAppParam();
00120         test.testWithSaltParam();
00121         test.testFailure();
00122         //test.testFileNotFound();
00123     Verbose::out (1, "NumPassed: " + ToStr (test.numPassed) + " NumFailed: " + ToStr (test.numFailed));
00124     return test.numFailed != 0;
00125   }
00126   catch(...) {
00127       Verbose::out(1,"Unexpected Error: uncaught exception.");
00128       return 1;
00129   }
00130   return 1;
00131 }
